titles.title: Public Health Emergency Accountability Act
Public Health Emergency Accountability Act
To provide for Congressional approval of public health emergency declarations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
